Name: Gazyi.SpectreRodeo
Description: Spectres can Rodeo Titans like in TF1.

ConVars.Name: sv_spectre_rodeo_reset
ConVars.HelpString: Allow Spectres to try rodeoing Titans again after successful attempt.

ConVars.Name: sv_spectre_rodeo_reset_time
ConVars.HelpString: Time in seconds before Spectre starts trying to rodeo Titans again after successful attempt.

ConVars.Name: sv_spectre_rodeo_allow_friendly
ConVars.HelpString: Allow Spectres with battery to rodeo friendly Titans.

ConVars.Name: sv_spectre_rodeo_nuke_grenade
ConVars.HelpString: Spectres will always use Core Overload grenades when rodeoing.

ConVars.Name: sv_spectre_rodeo_classic
ConVars.HelpString: Force Spectres to use classic rodeo, unless they're using Core Overload grenades.
